headline: Missiles Fired by Iran Downed Passenger Jet,  U.S. and Allies Believe
abstract: Western intelligence showed that Iran was responsible for the plane crash, suggesting that the deaths of those aboard were a consequence of the heightened tensions between Washington and Iran.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON â€” American and allied officials said on Thursday that they had intelligence that missiles fired by Iranian military forces were responsible for the downing of a Ukrainian jetliner and the deaths of all aboard this week in Iran, most likely by accident.
